scripts.api-docs-build: cd modules/docs && cp -f api.index.html.md source/index.html.md && bundle install && bundle exec middleman build --clean && mkdir -p ../api/public && cp -r build/* ../api/public/ && rm -f source/index.html.md
scripts.paybutton-docs-build: cd modules/docs && cp -f paybutton.index.html.md source/index.html.md && bundle install && bundle exec middleman build --clean && mkdir -p ../website/build/docs/ && cp -r build/* ../website/build/docs/ && mkdir -p ../website/public/docs && cp -r build/* ../website/public/docs/ && rm -f source/index.html.md
scripts.build: concurrently "yarn paybutton-docs-build && yarn api-docs-build" "concurrently \"yarn paybutton-build\" \"yarn inject-build\" && yarn site-build"
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn site-dev" "yarn api-dev" "yarn paybutton-dev" "yarn inject-dev" "yarn paybutton-docs-build && parn api-docs-build"
scripts.setup: yarn api-docs-build && yarn paybutton-docs-build && yarn api-setup
